column2: title=Sotheby's English Literature and English History 6-7 December 1984
image=[[File:Sotheby's English Literature and English History 6-7 December 1984.jpg

column1: '''''Sotheby's English Literature and English History 6-7 December 1984''''' is an auction catalogue from [[Sotheby's]] (London). The catalogue reproduces several writings by [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]: [[Concerning ... 'The Hoard']] and [[Kinship of the Half-elven]] (Lot 276) and several extracts from letters to Eileen Elgar (among them, [[Letter to Eileen Elgar (5 March 1964)]] and [[Letter to Eileen Elgar (24 December 1971)]]).<ref>''An Illustrated Tolkien Bibliography'' at [http://www.tolkienbooks.net/ TolkienBooks.net]</ref><ref>[[Wayne G. Hammond]] and [[Christina Scull]], [http://www.lotrplaza.com/forum/forum_posts.asp?TID=234549&PID=7245407 Forum post 13/Aug/2010 at 5:53pm], at [http://www.lotrplaza.com Lotrplaza.com], as of 22 August 2010</ref>
